alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harrison and northeastern Hancock Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 7 miles north of Kiln, or 9 miles north of Diamondhead, moving southeasteast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Saucier, Lyman and Kiln. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 31 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Southern Harrison
